mapper.select: SELECT su.real_name , su.mobile FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.id WHERE su.status = 1 AND sur.status = 1 AND sr.status = 1 AND sr.id = #{roleId}

SELECT sp.id , sp.name FROM sys_permission sp LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission srp on sp.id = srp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sr.id = srp.role_id WHERE sp.status = 1 AND srp.status = 1 AND sr.status = 1 AND sr.id = #{roleId}

SELECT so.id FROM sys_org so LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON so.id = sr.org_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sr.id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sur.user_id WHERE sr.status = 1 AND sur.status = 1 AND so.status = 1 AND su.status = 1 AND sur.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role_permission SET status = 0 WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
UPDATE sys_user_role SET status = 0 WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
